item.title: Got a problem
item.dc:creator: @mervboyj mervboyj
item.description:
@mervboyj wrote:

alright the guy duhpk showed me how to make a pk area but i need to know how to put my coords in there and also in like the last part u have to search for attackingplayerid= castonplayer.id; or watever it was… well i couldnt find it see look and plz help me with this

Search for:

public int untradable[]

Above that add

public boolean singleWild() { if((absX >= 3067 && absX <= 3122 && absY >= 3520 && absY <= 3706)) return true; else return false; }

Then search for

case 73: //Attack (Wilderness)[/code]

In that case look for

[code]inCombat();[/code]

Under that add

[code]if(plz.attackingPlayerId != playerId && plz.attackingPlayerId != 0 && singleWild() && plz.singleWild()) {
sendMessage("You cannot attack a player that is already in combat!");
attackingPlayerId = 0;
ResetAttack();
break;

Next Search for

public void AttackMage(int index)

In that look for

attackingPlayerId = castOnPlayer.playerId;

Under that add

if(castOnPlayer.attackingPlayerId != playerId && castOnPlayer.attackingPlayerId != 0 && singleWild() && castOnPlayer.singleWild()) { sendMessage("You cannot attack a player that is already in combat!"); spellID = 0; } else { castOnPlayer.attackingPlayerId = playerId; }

plzzzzz help me! thanks

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2008, 12:45:54 AM[/size][hr]heres the coords when u hit the emote tab and tele there
x-3254
Y-3420

Read full topic
